ClockTheme.name: Clock Theme
ClockTheme.hint: Change the default color and add new color choices

EnabledTypes.name: Enabled Types
EnabledTypes.hint: Change what sorts of progress trackers are supported
EnabledTypes.label: Change Enabled Types

defaultBackgroundColor.name: Background Color
defaultBackgroundColor.hint: The color shown for clock segments that are not filled in

defaultColor.name: Default Clock Color
defaultColor.hint: The color clocks have by base, assuming they are not of a specific clock type

location.name: Screen Location
location.hint: Where to anchor the displayed clocks

minimumEditorRole.name: Minimum Editor Role
minimumEditorRole.hint: Minimum role required to edit clock values

offset.name: Vertical Offset
offset.hint: Distance from the top or bottom in pixels. Used to handle module incompatibility.

clocks.label: Enable Clocks
clocks.hint: Support Blades in the Dark style pie chart progress trackers

points.label: Enable Points
points.hint: Support uncapped numerical counters that count up

trackers.label: Enable Trackers
trackers.hint: Add horizontal trackers as an alternative counter type.
